ISSUE.TITLE: Allow a store owner to choose available "sort by" options
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently you cannot choose the "sort by" selection from the admin panel. Your options are position, Name a - z, Name z - a, Price low to high, Price high to low, and so on. In many cases you want your products to be listed from cheapest to most expensive, but this seems impossible to do. It would be great if you can make the selection from the admin panel
